### Frequently asked questions for using R in production.

Just getting started? Here are some frequently asked questions for using R in production.

<br>

### How do organizations use R in production today?

Organizations use R to build analytic workflows, reproduce their work, deploy data products, influence decision making. R is a free and open source programming language that widely adopted across industries. It has a vibrant community that enables individuals to create new technologies and solutions.
